title: Amlou inspired spread: Formulation and characterization of new spread based on Ziziphus lotus L. fruit, argan oil, and honey
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Hasna Ait Bouzid, Abdelghani Ait Nouisse, Otmane Hallouch, Abderrahim Asbbane, Hicham Harhar, Jamal Koubachi, Filippo Maggi, Giovanni Caprioli, Abdelhakim Bouyahya, Said Gharby
